modName: Spooky Edits - Darker Female Archmage Robes
descriptionHtml:
[color=Lightsteelblue][b]Description :[/b][/color] Discontinued !, For Better or worse I re-created this texture, along with a male version for my [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/57178/?]Darker Robes[/URL] mod, will leave this up since it is a different variant though :)

[color=Lightsteelblue][b]Installation :[/b][/color] Since this is only a texture replacing mod you can just extract to your data folder / install using a mod manager as normal.

[color=Lightsteelblue][b]Why just the female version?! :[/b][/color] I am used to only editing the textures that effect my current character so those were the only ones I ever edited. This is a learning process for me and editing all images at once is a lesson well learned ! :) Hopefully none of my future mods are this restrictive.

[color=Lightsteelblue][b]Screenshots :[/b][/color] I always use the lossless versions of my textures alongside an edited [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30936/?/]RealVision Nova ENB[/url] with [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/27043/?/]Enhanced Lights And FX[/url]

[color=Lightsteelblue][b]DDS Format :[/b][/color] For now these textures are lossless 24/32bit only, 0.3 will have a normal option whenever it comes out (still not happy, but I released the boots from it as an optional file for now).


[center][color=Lightsteelblue][b](: More Spooky Edits :)

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/56654/?]Darker Thieves Guild Armor[/url]
[/b][/color][/center][center][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/56610/?]Darker Jester Clothes[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/56587/?]Darker Mehrunes Razor[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/55725/?]Darker Dark Brotherhood Shrouded Armor and Robes[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/55809/]Reworked Vanilla Female Shrouded Armor Texture Fix[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54816/?]Darker Vampire Armor[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54998/?]Glass Weapons[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54641/?]Darker Falmer Heavy Armor and Weapons[/url][/center]
author: SpookyMunky

files.name: Spooky Edits - Darker Female Archmage Robes
files.fileName: Dark Female Archmage Robes Tex Adjustment 0.2-54463-0-2.7z
files.changelogHtml: I became sick of my initial versions fast and realized I might have to spend longer than 5mins on this particular problem ;). The biggest change from my point of view (besides a lot more thought and effort) for this version is swapping to 24bpp (8.8.8.8 or 8.8.8 depending if texture has an alpha) instead of DXT5 8bpp. I need to get in some more practice with the dds file format I think.
